snippet: A panel will investigate the attacks on more than 100 United Nations facilities and the death of 11 staff members during the Gaza conflict during the summer.
abstract: Ban Ki-moon, United Nations secretary general, announces that five-member panel will investigate attacks on more than 100 UN facilities and death of 11 of its staff members during Gaza conflict; announcement defies Israeli demands to wait until conclusion of its own government inquiry.
lead_paragraph: A panel will investigate the attacks on more than 100 United Nations facilities and the death of 11 staff members during the Gaza conflict during the summer.

headline.main: U.N. to Investigate Strikes on Its Facilities in Gaza
headline.print_headline: Panel to Look at Gaza Strikes
